title: Bug: Coordination DB not ingesting handoffs (handoffs table empty)
description:
Original issue ID (lost during upstream merge due to bd DB re-init): Continuous-Claude-v3-jl1

Problem:
- Coordination DB (Postgres, DATABASE_URL) had sessions + file_claims rows but handoffs table stayed empty.

Root cause:
- hook handoff-index only handled .md handoffs and spawned a non-existent root scripts/artifact_index.py.

Fix implemented:
- Added opc/scripts/core/handoff_ingest.py to upsert handoff records into Postgres public.handoffs keyed by file_path.
- Updated .claude/hooks/src/handoff-index.ts to:
  - recognize thoughts/shared/handoffs/**/*.{yaml,yml,md}
  - spawn the ingester via uv from the opc directory
- Rebuilt and committed .claude/hooks/dist/handoff-index.mjs

Key commits on feat/continuity-system:
- 5d4e8ab: ingest script + hook update
- 96781b2: rebuilt bundled hook dist/handoff-index.mjs
- plus upstream sync merge commits}
close_reason: Implemented Postgres handoff ingestion (opc/scripts/core/handoff_ingest.py) + updated handoff-index hook to ingest YAML and rebuilt dist bundle (see commits 5d4e8ab, 96781b2).
